content:
Is there any example using DataRequirement.searchParameter? All example in https://www.hl7.org/fhir/metadatatypes-examples.html#DataRequirement are using DataRequirement.path.
Is this correct?

{
  "type": "Procedure",
  "codeFilter": [
    {
      "searchParameter": "code=123,456"
    }
  ]
}
